member.name: M:Gateway.API.Controllers.Auth.TokenController.GenerateToken(System.Object)
member.summary: Generates JWT token based on the given username and password.
member.returns: JWT token response model if the authentication is successful, otherwise returns Bad Request.

member.name: M:Gateway.API.Controllers.Auth.TokenController.IntrospectToken(System.Object)
member.param: Model containing the token to be introspected.
member.returns: SystemUserResponseModel if the token is valid, otherwise returns Bad Request.
